headline: Is Deckers Outdoor Attractively Priced After Its 50% Slide And Recent Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Deckers Outdoor is a bargain after its wild ride, or if the market already has the story right, you are in the right place to unpack what the current share price really implies. The stock has slipped about 1.7% over the last week, but that comes after a sharp 19.8% climb over the past month and a much steeper slide of more than 50% year to date and over the last year, which makes the long term 3 year and 5 year gains of 52.7% and 103.9% feel a lot less...
